metadata.feature_description: Display posts in different view modes including list, detail, and card views

steps.expected: Posts should be displayed in card view layout
steps.actual: Posts displayed in 3-column card grid layout with 'Latest' header. Each card shows title, summary, date, and author

steps.action: Verify card view displays all post metadata
steps.expected: Each card should show title, summary, date, and author
steps.actual: Cards display title (clickable link), truncated summary, 'Posted on [date] by' text, and author name. Cards are styled with cyan border accent

steps.action: Click on a post card to view detail
steps.expected: Should navigate to post detail page showing full content
steps.actual: Navigated to detail page showing breadcrumb navigation (News > Post Title), post title as h1, horizontal separator, date, tags with links, and full post body content

steps.action: Verify author section and social sharing
steps.expected: Author info and sharing options should be displayed
steps.actual: Author section shows avatar, 'Written by [Author Name]' text, 'More from this author' link. Social sharing section shows 'Share this post:' with Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and RSS feed links

steps.action: Examine post cards in list view for metadata
steps.expected: Posts should display date, author, title, and summary
steps.actual: Each card displays: title (as h2 with link), truncated summary text, 'Posted on [date] by' line, and author name on separate line

steps.action: Examine detail view for complete metadata
steps.expected: Detail view should show complete post information including tags
steps.actual: Detail view shows: breadcrumb, title (h1), horizontal separator, date, tags section with 'tags:' label and comma-separated clickable tag links (technology, news, innovation), full body content, author section

steps.action: Click on a tag in the sidebar to filter posts
steps.expected: Posts should be filtered by the selected tag
steps.actual: Clicked 'technology' tag. URL updated to /News?tags=technology. Breadcrumb appeared showing 'News > Search Results'. Only posts with 'technology' tag displayed

steps.expected: Cards should stack in single column for mobile view
steps.actual: At 480px width, cards displayed in single column layout. Each card shows title, summary, date, and author. Layout adapts responsively to narrow viewport

steps.expected: Empty state message should be displayed
steps.actual: Searched for 'xyznonexistent'. Displayed 'Your search returned no results.' message in the empty state area with breadcrumb 'News > Search Results'

steps.action: Navigate to post detail and check page title
steps.expected: Page title should reflect the post title for SEO
steps.actual: Post detail page title is 'Tech News and Innovation' matching the post title. URL is SEO-friendly: /News/Tech-News-and-Innovation

steps.action: Verify list page renders posts server-side for SEO
steps.expected: Posts should be rendered server-side for search engine indexing
steps.actual: List view renders first page of posts server-side (verified via code review of List.ascx). Cards contain semantic HTML with h2 headings and proper link structure

steps.action: View list page with multiple posts
steps.expected: Load More button should appear if posts exceed page size
steps.actual: List view displays 13 posts. Code review confirms 'Load More' link appears when PostList.Count() >= PageSize. The link triggers CardViewManager.loadMore() for infinite scroll loading

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test sidebar with Tags and Authors

steps.action: View sidebar filters on list page
steps.expected: Tags and Authors sections should be displayed with counts
steps.actual: Sidebar displays: Search box, Tags section with count badges (technology: 2, news: 2, innovation: 1, gadgets: 1, sports: 1), Authors section (SuperUser Account: 13)

steps.action: Verify social sharing links on detail page
steps.expected: Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and RSS links should be present
steps.actual: Detail page displays 'Share this post:' section with Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest links (javascript:void(0) handlers) and RSS feed link pointing to /News/view/rss

observations: The Publisher module uses a card-based layout rather than traditional list/grid toggle view modes. All posts display in the same card format.
Featured posts view (Featured.ascx) exists in code but appears to be a separate module instance, not a view mode toggle within the main Publisher module.
Code review shows server-side rendering of first page posts for SEO purposes, with subsequent pages loaded via AJAX (CardViewManager.js).
The 'Load More' pagination uses infinite scroll pattern rather than numbered pages.
Edit mode is only visible when user has edit permissions, showing an edit bar with Settings, Unpublished Posts, and Create Post options.
Mobile responsive design uses CSS breakpoints to switch between desktop multi-column and mobile single-column layouts.
